justification: “The Concealed Information Test (CIT) allows assessing the recognition of concealed information… In the response-time (RT) based CIT, the concealing of information is detected by the time it takes examinees to correctly classify items.”

“Undetected deception may lead to extreme costs… researchers have developed various deception detection methods, including the Concealed Information Test (CIT)… the RT-CIT can distinguish knowledgeable (i.e., possibly guilty) examinees from naïve (i.e., innocent) examinees.”
